Hekkus Sound System ver. 0.99.rc2



What is this?

Hekkus Sound System is a small and fast sound engine for WinCE/Win32/Symbian application, expecially designed for games.



Features

-> fast mixer routine (written from scratch), minimized data access and no division used!
-> supports all mips, sh3, arm and xscale Microsoft PocketPC and Smartphone.
-> supports all Series 60 Smartphones (N-Gage, 7650, 3650, 6600, Sendo X, Siemens SX1, etc)
-> supports also Win95/98 and Win2000/XP for cross platform development (code on Win32 and play on WinCE :-)
-> mix up to 3 ProTracker module and up to 64 waves sound.
-> supports 8bit/16bit uncompressed and Microsoft ADPCM compressed mono WAVs
-> very easy api, you can do all with 4 little C++ classes.
-> free for freeware/shareware and commercial games!
-> source code available if you provide a donation!



License

Hekkus Sound System is now Donate-Ware.
If you have used Hekkus on your game and have earn enought money please make a donation.
Something like from 25 to 50 euro will be very appreciated, but if you think you don't have sell enough and you still want to donate something feel free to donate the amount you feel right.

You can freely use Hekkus on your free or commercial product but you have to write somewhere on your game a little credit string, something like 'Sound provided by Hekkus Sound System - http://www.shlzero.com'.
You HAVE also to send me an e-mail for every game you want to release that use Hekkus.

Source code is NOT included with the package, if you want the code make a donation and I'll send it to you!
